titles.title: Recognizing the significant contribution coaches make in the life of children who participate in organized sports and supporting the goals and ideals of National Coaches Appreciation Week.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 10.

bill.summary:
1/6/2009--Introduced.
Expresses support for the goals and ideals of National Coach Appreciation Week.
